conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D isometric-style render with extruded walls (height + thickness), visible floor planes, and interior volumes exposed by roof/ceiling removal.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with clear wall thickness and clean corner geometry; elevated angled view with minimal distortion; cutaway is clean and interiors are readable.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room arrangement matches: open lounge/dining on left, kitchen central/top, two bedrooms on right, bath/WC core, and garage to the right. Minor fidelity concerns around exterior/balcony depiction and some opening placements not perfectly verifiable from the render.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen cabinetry/appliances and bathroom fixtures are present. However, major living/bedroom furniture (sofa, dining table, beds) is largely absent, reducing room-identity confirmation.

visual_clarity.notes: Good lighting and material separation; walls/floors/openings are distinct with no obvious broken meshes. Background is clean and does not include UI/text overlays.

detected_errors.description: Living and bedroom furniture is mostly missing, making some room identity confirmation rely on layout alone.
Some doors/windows/exterior features (e.g., balcony/external access) are not perfectly confirmable or may be simplified compared to the 2D plan.

summary: A true, clean cutaway 3D conversion with strong layout fidelity to the 2D plan, with minor opening/exterior-detail uncertainty and simplified/limited furniture.
